if(DEFINED ENV{ENVIRONMENT_CMAKE_MODULES}) 
	  
set (ENVIRONMENT_CMAKE_MODULES $ENV{ENVIRONMENT_CMAKE_MODULES})
else()
    message(FATAL_ERROR "ENVIRONMENT_CMAKE_MODULES VARIABLE NOT SET")
endif()

if(DEFINED ENV{ENVIRONMENT_PLATFORM_DIR}) 
	  
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY ENVIRONMENT_PLATFORM_DIR $ENV{ENVIRONMENT_PLATFORM_DIR})
else()
    message(FATAL_ERROR "ENVIRONMENT_PLATFORM_DIR VARIABLE NOT SET")
endif()

if(DEFINED ENV{ENVIRONMENT_COMMON_DIR}) 
	  
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY ENVIRONMENT_COMMON_DIR $ENV{ENVIRONMENT_COMMON_DIR})
else()
    message(FATAL_ERROR "ENVIRONMENT_COMMON_DIR VARIABLE NOT SET")
endif()

set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH} ${ENVIRONMENT_CMAKE_MODULES} PARENT_SCOPE)
